body.name: Wireless Keyboard and Mouse Combo - MOFII Coffee Full-Sized Plug and Play Colorful Keyboard - Silence Keycap Keyboards with USB-A 2.4G Receiver, for Laptop, Windows, PC, Desktop
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 1 hr 5 mins
features: ▥ θ【Cute Wireless Keyboard and Mouse Combo】2022 is the most popular color, to attract more people's eyes, give you a different Typing feel, enjoy a different keyboard experience, create a colorful desk, and be a pleasant mood for you!

▥ θ【Ergonomic Keyboard Mouse Combo】- MOFII full-size color keyboard with a comfortable wrist rest. Provide you with the most comfortable inclination, Relieve wrist fatigue from long hours of typing and protect your wrist from this hidden injury.

▥ θ【Plug & Play 2.4Ghz Wireless Keyboard】- Just one mini USB Nano receiver can connect both the wireless keyboard and mouse to your computer. Plug & play, no additional driver required. Enjoy wireless Freedom and working range up to 10m/33ft. ( NOTE: The USB receiver is stored in the mouse.)

▥ θ【Sleep Function】- If you do not use the keyboard for more than a minute, the keyboard will go into sleep mode, which is a good extension of battery life, click the mouse or any button on the keyboard to wake up the keyboard.

▥ θ【Wireless Optical Mouse - Enjoy Comfortable Hand-feeling】 - This wireless mouse was an optical design, with smooth surfaces, click completely mute, comfortable touch. DPI 1200 moving speed of cursor, precise control can be obtained. (NOTE: Battery not included)

▥ θ【Compatibility】- Wireless keyboard and mouse combination Works with PC, Laptop, Desktop, Chrome-Book, Mac, Smart TV, etc. with Windows XP/X/Win 7/8/10/2000/ME Vista iOS OS, etc operating systems perfect configuration.
body.description: Wireless Keyboard and Mouse Combo Fashion Multi-color Wireless keyboard and Mouse Combo- Enjoy Wireless Freedom. Stable wireless connection 2.4G wireless Keyboard and Mouse provides a powerful and reliable connection up to 10m(33 feet) without any delays. This wireless keyboard adopts a mixed-color design, using Laser printing, the letters on the keycaps will not easily blur or fall off. All 106 Keys non-conflict. Specifications: Powered by one AAA battery for keyboard and one AA battery for mouse (NOTE: Batteries is not included ) Transmission distance: 10m/33ft Keyboard size: 436 x 182x 24(h)±2mm Mouse size: 103 x 69 x 35(h) ±2mm Keyboard weight: about 545g ± 5g Mouse weight: about 75g ± 5g Package Included: Wireless Keyboard x 1 Wireless Mouse x 1 USB Nano receiver x1 User manual x 1

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.2 4.2 out of 5 stars 59 ratings 4.2 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Thus keyboard is so easy to connect, keys are SATISFYING, and packaging is so high end looking. Anyone who sees it has to touch it. So far we have connected it to my Samsung smart TV, iPhone, Androids, and Samsung tablet with no problem. Typing on it IS weird because of placement but you can adjust your normal typing to fit this style like any other keyboard. It's fun, great build quality and super pretty!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I like it but it may not be for everyone
reviews.reviewText: I initially saw it as a suggested item on the homepage and was curious. I'm always looking for a keyboard to work with the little desk space I have. Size wise, it's perfect. Just the right size. The rubber grips on the bottom make it a decent lap keyboard too. While some people complain about the key shape, while I agree that this is more of a gimmick anda showpiece, it works for me. I went with the pink one because the F and J keyes were different colors, which for me makes it easier to readjust if my fingers get lost on the keyboard.Honestly, while for me it works fine and I was able to adjust to the layout and key shapes pretty easily, I know this isn't for everyone. If there's one thing I've learned as a writer, it's that everyone has their own preference for what works for them when it comes to keyboards. So what works for one person may not work for someone else.My only real issues with the keyboard is that the spring on the spacebar is a little loud and squeaks sometimes, and sometimes it doesn't register that I've hit the spacebar even when I've pressed down on it. Other than that, I don't know if it just takes longer than most tech to charge or if mine is defective, but for some reason when unplugged it refuses to show any sign that it's charged at all. I haven't been able to use the bluetooth feature because of that, but other than that when it's plugged in I do really like the keyboard overall.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This keyboard looks so slick. I was so pleased to find out it also actually feels good to use and works well. The body is aluminum and the keys are plastic with a smooth, semi-soft feel to them. It has a good weight and the rubber feet make sure it doesn’t slide around my desk. The keys are smooth. It feels like a semi-mechanical membrane keyboard.The only thing I don’t like about it is that some of the buttons are in weird places. I’m constantly pressing the up arrow when I want to press right shift. It may be possible to remap the keys if you’re an advance PC user and fix this issue.I use the keyboard plugged in and have not tried the Bluetooth so I can’t comment on that or it’s battery life.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cool factor 10/10 functionality 3/10
reviews.reviewText: Seems very well built but, I should have listened to the reviews warning about the hex keys making it difficult to type on. This keyboard is a gimmick and nothing more. It is pretty cool and I would give it 3 1/2 stars if I could but, I ultimately bought a high tech paper weight. I want to like it but, it's just too impractical to type on. I'm just going to eat the $10 and give it to my friends kid. Curiosity was not my friend this time, if you're curious about this product, I would shift your curiosity to another product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Feels better than bought for.
reviews.reviewText: This key oard was 12 dollars at the time of purchase and came in a very neat and designed box. This key board is heavier than expected too and feels a lot more durable than I thought. You'll have to get used to the hexagon keys but it feels great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cool and Compact
reviews.reviewText: This is a very fun keyboard and I've quite enjoyed using it. The shape of the keys does take a bit of adjustment, but after that that I've had no issues. The packaging itself was also impressive. I don't think I've ever had such a fancy box for a keyboard before 😅My only small issue is the placement and size of the right shift key. The up arrow is far larger, leading me to at time hit it instead of shift when I am trying.Aside from that, this is a great keyboard for the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I would give it 5 if was not I have to press command, shift, Alt etc to find the character or symbols besides that is super quiet and pretty to look at it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This keyboard is nice I like the way it looks first of all very appealing online and in person. It is pretty spacious as far as the distance between each key because it’s big. Nevertheless this keyboard is very nice it doesn’t have clicky key sounds, it doesn’t sound like a type writer, it Bluetooth capable and it can also be hard wired. I like it was a nice addition to my pc.
